mapper.insert: insert into HZ_TEMPITEMRECORD (ID, BEL_PROCESS_NUM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEMREVISION, CATIA_DIGIFAX, JT_DIGIFAX, "CGR_ DIGIFAX", CATIA_BLUEPRINT, CAD_BLUEPRINT, OTHERS) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{belProcessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemrevision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catiaDigifax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jtDigifax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cgrDigifax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{catiaBlueprint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cadBlueprint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{others,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
